% DIN5008 template based on the Koma-Skript scrlttr2 letter class. For more further configuration and details
% take a look at the scrlttr2 documentation available in both English and German at https://ctan.org/pkg/scrlttr2
\documentclass[
	version=last,
	fontsize=12pt,
	parskip=full,
	paper=A4,	
	% fromphone,
	% fromemail,
	% texcoord,
	%fromurl,
	%foldmarks,
]{scrlttr2}

\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
\usepackage[ngerman]{babel}
\usepackage{graphicx}

% This command allows users to include a Deutsche Post Internetmarke.
% These dimensions only work for the Pdf generated by clicking "Absender und Empfänger bearbeiten" and 
% "Adresse(n) übernehmen" without entering any actual address. 
\newcommand{\includepostage}[1]{
	\centering
		\includegraphics[trim=28mm 243mm 124mm 38mm,clip]{#1}
}

\begin{document}

% Load the DIN5008A or DIN5008B layout. This could be specified in the documentclass options, but
% the scrlttr2 documentation recommends to explicitly load it via \LoadLetterOption{}
\LoadLetterOption{DIN5008B}

% sender's address
\setkomavar{fromname}{Firstname Lastname}
\setkomavar{fromaddress}{Musterstr. 24}
\setkomavar{fromphone}{+49 12345689}
\setkomavar{fromemail}{name@domain.tld}

% Information, such as customer ID or an ID that refers to your correspondence
% Optionally, you can define your own descriptions for these fields, such as:
\setkomavar{yourref}[Ihr Zeichen]{frbb12399}
\setkomavar{yourmail}[Ihr Schreiben vom]{06.06.2021}
\setkomavar{customer}[Kundennummer]{228299741}


% Place and date. The place is only displayed when variables such as
% yourref yourmain and customer are not specified.
\setkomavar{place}{Köln}
\setkomavar{date}{\today}


\setkomavar{subject}{Some undeniably important issue you need to address}


\begin{letter}{
\includepostage{path/Internetmarke}\\ %see newcommand definition above for more information
	MusterVersicherung\\
	Fischerstr. 42\\
	98562 Düsseldorf\\
}

\opening{Sehr geehrte Damen und Herren,}

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat cupidatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

\closing{Viele Grüße}


\end{letter}


\end{document}
